text:
I just install Trunk version of Jahia.
I connect as lenya/levi
I go to the Site slot
I click on 'Trash'
and i get :
No pipeline matched request:
uri-parameter/default/doctype/trash/_%7B$chosenlanguage%7D
org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Unable to get transformer handler for
cocoon://lenya-page/default/trash/default.xml:
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in creating
Transform Handler

StackTrace:
cause: org.apache.cocoon.ResourceNotFoundException: No pipeline matched request:
uri-parameter/default/doctype/trash/_%7B$chosenlanguage%7D

creator: eburriel@yahoo.com

text:
That's due to a pending design decision (non-document URLs in the site area). I
started a thread on lenya-dev.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
i get 

org.apache.avalon.framework.CascadingRuntimeException:
"file:/C:/src/lenya-trunk/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecases.js", line
141: uncaught JavaScript exception: at executeUsecase
(file:/C:/src/lenya-trunk/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecases.js, Line
141): org.apache.lenya.cms.usecase.UsecaseException:
org.apache.lenya.transaction.TransactionException:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException: java.io.FileNotFoundException:
C:\src\lenya-trunk\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\default\content\rcml\content\trash\_{$chosenlanguage}\index_en.xml.meta.rcml
(The system cannot find the path specified)

as of today
creator: gregor@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: I disabled the area nodes in the sitetree until a solution is found.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: The area nodes are now handled properly.
